physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a man posing in the position of standing at ease. He adorns a military uniform consisting of a top, shorts, knee length socks, and shoes. He is looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. The background of the photograph shows greenery and trees.
title_text: Military Personnel Standing at Ease Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
